objects.specification: A rectangular floor panel spanning the entire booth area, made of warm-toned wooden planks with a subtle grain texture and matte finish, creating an inviting foundation for the exhibition space.
A tall wall panel with uniform thickness, featuring a smooth surface painted in a light gray matte finish, with clean straight edges for a modern and neutral backdrop.
A tall wall panel with uniform thickness, featuring a smooth surface painted in a light gray matte finish, with clean straight edges for a modern and neutral backdrop.
A broad back wall panel with consistent thickness, finished in a light gray matte paint, providing a crisp and clean background suitable for branding and signage.
A reception desk featuring a bold rectangular form finished in a bright red high-gloss lacquer, with clean lines, a minimalist profile, and a flat work surface designed to attract visitor attention.
A tall, narrow white display shelf with multiple open shelves, crafted in a matte lacquer finish, featuring slim vertical supports and evenly spaced horizontal planes for product presentation.
A tall, narrow white display shelf with multiple open shelves, crafted in a matte lacquer finish, featuring slim vertical supports and evenly spaced horizontal planes for product presentation.
A low-profile rectangular carpet rug in a warm, earthy hue with a dense woven texture and subtle pattern, designed to visually anchor the central display area.
A compact interactive display pedestal featuring a square top with integrated digital touchscreen, housed in a light gray metallic casing with clean edges for modern presentations.

A small round table with a smooth white tabletop supported by a single central column and stable base, embodying a minimalist modern aesthetic for casual seating.
